title: Is PBE only in NA ?
body: I live in Oce and I've always wondered how to make a pbe account I looked around some on told me that you have to be in NA or EWU to do so , I'm not absolutely sure , is there like an Oce PBE ? And why on if there isn't

replies.body:
Hey there,

Unfortunately this is the case as of now. Feel free to create a new NA/EUW/EUNE account and level to apply for the pbe.
